topic.title: TCP/IP Settings for Standby Onboard Administrator
topic.keywords: DNS server gateway address NIC settings Onboard Administrator name router advertisements standby Onboard Administrator TCP/IP settings subnet mask TCP/IP (Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol) Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol (TCP/IP) VLAN Id

content.p: This screen displays the current TCP/IP settings for the standby Onboard Administrator:
For information about the TCP/IP settings that appear on this screen, see the Active Onboard Administrator TCP/IP Settings screen.
To modify the TCP/IP settings, select Click here.
For information about the TCP/IP settings that you can modify, see the Enclosure TCP/IP Settings IPv4 Settings tab, IPv6 Settings tab, NIC Options tab, and Advanced Settings tab.
For information about TCP/IP settings seen from the Standby Onboard Administrator GUI, see "TCP/IP settings at Standby Onboard Administrator."
